code: import React,{useRef,useState,useEffect}from"react";import perspective from"perspective-transform";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const undo=()=>{if(history.length===0)return;const canvas=canvasRef.current;const ctx=canvas.getContext("2d");const img=new offsetY=(CANVAS_HEIGHT-newHeight)/2;canvas.width=CANVAS_WIDTH;canvas.height=CANVAS_HEIGHT;ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);ctx.drawImage(img,offsetX,offsetY,newWidth,newHeight);setImageSrc(event.target.result);setImageSize({width:newWidth,height:newHeight});setDrawOffset({x:offsetX,y:offsetY});setDimensions({width:newWidth,height:newHeight});setCropPoints([{x:offsetX+20,y:offsetY+20},{x:offsetX+newWidth-20,y:offsetY+20},{x:offsetX+newWidth-20,y:offsetY+newHeight-20},{x:offsetX+20,y:offsetY+newHeight-20}]);saveToHistory();};img.src=event.target.result;};reader.readAsDataURL(file);};const Arial";ctx.fillStyle="black";ctx.fillText(text,x,y);});if(isCropping&&cropPoints.length===4){ctx.strokeStyle="red";ctx.lineWidth=2;ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(cropPoints[0].x,cropPoints[0].y);for(let i=1;i<4;i++){ctx.lineTo(cropPoints[i].x,cropPoints[i].y);}ctx.closePath();ctx.stroke();cropPoints.forEach(pt=>{ctx.fillStyle="blue";ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(pt.x,pt.y,6,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.fill();});}};img.src=imageSrc;};useEffect(()=>{redrawCanvas();},[imageSrc,cropPoints,isCropping,textInputs]);const handleMouseDown=e=>{if(isAddingText){const rect=canvasRef.current.getBoundingClientRect();const x=e.clientX-rect.left;const y=e.clientY-rect.top;setTextInputs([...textInputs,{text:currentText,x,y}]);setIsAddingText(false);setCurrentText("");saveToHistory();return;}if(!isCropping)return;const rect=canvasRef.current.getBoundingClientRect();const x=e.clientX-rect.left;const y=e.clientY-rect.top;cropPoints.forEach((point,idx)=>{const dx=x-point.x;const x=e.clientX-rect.left;const y=e.clientY-rect.top;const updated=[...cropPoints];updated[draggingPoint]={x,y};setCropPoints(updated);};const handleMouseUp=()=>{setDraggingPoint(null);};const handleResize=()=>{const canvas=canvasRef.current;const ctx=canvas.getContext("2d");const img=new handleCrop=()=>{if(cropPoints.length!==4)return;const canvas=canvasRef.current;const ctx=canvas.getContext("2d");const img=new Image();img.onload=()=>{const
